tweet: ASIC Resistance Increasingly Hot Topic in Crypto as Monero Forks  https://t.co/Qn95iaKqjW #Bitcoin  https://t.co/NLq2gFA7w9
Monero hash rate taking a dive after hard forking to get rid of ASICS. #byeFelicia  https://t.co/Q3CrXMSCSb

One post-mortem of the monero hard fork is that ASICs probably did control a majority of hash power but felt that mining the chain rather than attacking it was the better move. Miner concentration is a problem, but they don't like to set their equipment on fire (51% attack)

Congrats @monerocurrency @fluffypony on successful $XMR Fork to shake off ASICs. 160 blocks over the last 35 hours - hashrate of ~84.2 Mh/s down from 1.15 Gh/s -> 92.6% drop in hashrate caused by ASICs? Impressive and a bold move :) - I'm a fan
